entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Westlock
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the morning then rising. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the morning then rising. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets early in the evening. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
